Posts.Content: sgupta wrote: After on letrozole for almost two years, i had been put on Inj. Faslodex...already taken three doses and fouth on is due in next 10 days. I had my regular blood tests in which they did Liver function tests also. The values of alkaline phosphatase, GGT, SGPT, SGOT comes out to be too high.. Does this signifies that myÂ  cancer is progressing to liver also.. Dx 2/28/2012, 1cm, Stage IV, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: increased liver enzymes sgupta

Posts.Content: sgupta wrote: Myself 62 years...Diagonsed with Metatstatic breast cancer abt 2 months back. Almost all the vertebrae of spine and ribs also showed mets in PET scan. The tissue taken from breast was found to be 95% ER+/Pr+ and Her2-ve. My onco did not do any surgery, neither prescribed any chemo- or radio-. He just started the hormonal therapy. letrozole(2.5 mg) once in a day at a fix time and Injecton of zoledronic acid through IV monthly. Somebody told me that i should change my onco- and must take chemotherapy...I'm in a fix...what to do?? can anybody help?? Dx 2/28/2012, 1cm, Stage IV, mets, ER+/PR+, HER2- Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Best Treatment for Stage IV metastatic breast cancer sgupta EnglishMajor
